                                              GridCacheOperation op,
                                              @Nullable
                                              UUID subjId,
                                              int taskNameHash,
                                              byte flags,
                                              boolean addDepInfo)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        cacheId - Cache ID.
        nodeId - Node ID.
        futId - Future ID.
        topVer - Topology version.
        syncMode - Synchronization mode.
        op - Cache update operation.
        subjId - Subject ID.
        taskNameHash - Task name hash code.
        flags - Flags.
        addDepInfo - Deployment info flag.
